data.title: Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills
data.meta_description: Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills hotel offers spacious, pet-friendly rooms and suites, parking, laundry services, a pool, and modern amenities.
data.text:
Make Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills your home base during your next stay in Detroit. The Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills is conveniently located right on I-75, near both Oakland University, Stellantis, and Great Lakes Crossing. Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills puts the entire Detroit metro region easily at your fingertips.

Our passion shines through, no matter the reason for your visit. Business travelers love us for our oversized rooms, friendly service with local insight, meeting room and private lobby workspaces, and convenient location. Our indoor heated pool makes a splash with families, as do our spacious guest rooms and complimentary WiFi. And everyone appreciates the convenience of on-site dining for breakfast and evening cocktail and snack, our well-equipped fitness center, and on-site parking. Please note we have an early departure Fee of $50 per booking.

We strive to make your stay as comfortable as possible and to accommodate the needs of our guests with disabilities. Please contact the hotel if you have any special requests relating to your disability.

The following areas are accessible:

Public entrance

Route from the hotel's entrance to:

The registration area

The meeting rooms

The fitness center

The swimming pool

Registration desk

Public restroom

Accessible parking spaces for cars in self-parking facility

Fitness center

Swimming pool

Additional accessibility information:

Service animals are welcome

Hotel employees will read menus and other printed/visual information and provide verbal directions to locations in the hotel to guests who are blind/low vision

Audio/visual fire alarms in common areas

Information About Accessible Guest Rooms

Our hotel has the following accessible suite types:

Mobility/Hearing Accessible Room, One King, Sofa bed, Tub

Mobility/Hearing Accessible Room, One King, Sofa bed, Roll-in shower

Mobility/Hearing Accessible Room, Two Queens, Roll-in shower

Mobility/Hearing Accessible Room, Two Queens, Tub

One Bedroom Suite, One King, Sofa bed, Roll-in shower

Mobility/Hearing Accessible One Bedroom Suite, Two Doubles, Sofa bed, Tub

Mobility/Hearing Accessible One Bedroom Suite, Two Doubles, Sofa bed, Roll-in shower

Suites designated as mobility accessible have features for guests with mobility disabilities, including, but not limited to:

Doorways that provide 32” of clear width

Roll-in shower or tub with grab bars (specific bathing fixture type is indicated for each room in the room name)

Lowered light switches and thermostats

Toilets with grab bars

Accessible vanity

Accessible route to all parts of the room

Suites designated as hearing accessible have features for guests who are deaf or hard of hearing, including visual alarms and notification devices.

We love your furry friends as much as you do.

Sonesta is proud to invite your cuddly companions and provide special amenities like comfy pet beds, bowls, waterproof mats, and treats at check-in. We’ll greet your pet with an arrival letter outlining our local recommendations for a pawsome stay.

Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills is pet-friendly and welcomes well-mannered pets, with no breed or weight restrictions. Up to two pets are permitted per suite.

$75 fee per stay applies.

Learn more about our pet policy here.

At Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills, we are proud to offer an extensive selection of amenities and services to make your stay as comfortable and effortless as possible.

Business Services

Designed with the business traveler in mind, enjoy access to our 24-hour business services, with printing and copying capabilities.

Meeting Spaces

Our meeting room is perfect for a working session with colleagues, small training class or team breakfast. Need to check in with the office or hop on a conference call? Spread out in one of our flexible lobby workspaces.

Fitness Center & Pool

Enjoy many of the conveniences of a full gym. Our well-equipped fitness center helps you stay on top of your game with free weights, cardio machines, and space to stretch out. And our heated indoor pool is fun for the family.

Laundry Services

We are pleased to offer on-site laundry facilities for your convenience.

The Commons at Sonesta Select

Please note, limited offerings are available at this time.

The Commons, our casual on-site restaurant offers a selection of healthy, delicious and indulgent options for breakfast. Discover our to-go items including croissants, muffins, bagels, Danishes, yogurt, cereal, oatmeal, and hard-boiled eggs. Or, settle in and enjoy our hot items likes fluffy pancake stacks, avocado toast, and egg sandwiches. Sip on delicious Starbucks coffee to get your day off to an energizing start.

Fuel up or wind down with these food and beverage options:

The Commons at Sonesta Select serving breakfast.

Starbucks hand-crafted beverages

24/7 on-site market offering snacks, drinks, and fresh bites

A wide choice of nearby restaurants

Local restaurant delivery

Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills is ideally located right on I-75 and near many universities, businesses, and hospitals. Our well-equipped meeting rooms provide a great setting for your next team workshop, group breakfast, board meeting, training, or other gathering for your organization. And our relaxed and comfortable guest rooms provide the ideal accommodations for your participants and guests when they are in town.

Explore Venue

Contact Us

Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills is the perfect venue for conferences, training sessions, meetings and events of all sizes. Contact the Sales and Catering Department for new group events or meeting inquiries.

At Sonesta Select Detroit Auburn Hills, we go above and beyond to welcome sports groups of all ages and types. Our Auburn Hills location and sports-friendly amenities make us a favorite among sports group travel.

We are proud to uphold our Sports Certified status through the Sonesta International Hotels Corporation family of hotels. This certification means that our hotel has undergone industry-specific training and has demonstrated the ability to successfully accommodate sports groups.

We offer special sports group amenities that focus on creating convenience and value for your team, so you can concentrate on the game.

Breakfast included in rate

Parking included in rate

Complimentary WiFi

Complimentary meeting space (if available on site)

Contact our Sales office at 248-373-4100 to book a group room block for your team, or book your own room here.

Turn your special day into a special weekend with us. Qualify your block for complimentary shuttle service to and from the hotel and your wedding venue. Guests can enjoy the comforts of home before and after your wedding and not have to worry about transportation. Need a place to get ready before your big day? Ask about our Glam Room setup in our meeting rooms.

For more information on shuttle services and our Glam Room, please reach out to kyle.allinder@sonesta.com.

Local Wedding Venues

Boulder Pointe Golf Club

Pine Knob Mansion/Carriage House

Paint Creek Country Club

The Treasury

Lafayette Grande

2GatherMore
